About Me

My name is Daniel Ward, and I'm a DevOps engineer with a passion for exploring new ways of interacting any type of software and hardware can come my way.

I'm highly interested in hosting platforms and and tools like AWS, Docker, Python, Flask and Lambda. Arduino, Raspberry Pi, RTL-SDR, ESP8266 and what ever else I can convince my wife to let me buy take up a large part of my spare time.

I'm known and respected for my troubleshooting and quick thinking in any emergency situation and take pride in being the "go to" guy for just about anything you tech related you can think of.

I welcome you to take a look through my blog posts for some more insight.

Projects

Guvera

International music streaming service focused on brand funded solutions to combat music piracy and provide a unique service for both brands and users alike.

Fradio

With Fradio you can broadcast the music you want the world to hear. Discover what tracks your closest friends and biggest idols are playing at this very moment.
